description:
As a user
  I want to access the dashboard page
  So that I can view my account information and data
name: SrcRepairTickets Page Functionality

elements.name: visibility check, Create Student repair ticket and Search

steps.name: I should navigate to application
I should Sign In into the application
close the terms of service window
Click on Repair360 page
Click on StudentRepairCenter tab
Click on SrcRepairTickets tab
Verify the Title of SrcRepairTickets Page
Click on filter of Record Id Equals and Verify the Result

Click on Download Export button
I should click on Create Student Repair Ticket button
Select failure Type, Serial Device, Technician and building
Enter the Chromebook issue and Image description
Click on save button
Verify New Ticket is added
Click on view button
Verify the Details of student repair ticket
Click on Add Repair Image and Verify
Click on Add Note and Verify
Click on Add Line and Verify
